attributes.action: petition for vat relief for the disabled
attributes.background: An act of Parliament entitles Vat relief to INDIVIDUALS with special needs. Those charities that require a piece of equipment for the benefit of a GROUP of those with special needs are not entitled. A change of law is required.

rejection.details:
Charities can already claim VAT relief on certain goods and building work for disabled people. We're therefore not exactly sure what further action you want the Government or Parliament to take. 

You can find out what goods and building work are included here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/vat-relief-for-charities-on-building-work-for-disabled-people 

You could start a new petition asking for specific goods for disabled people to be included, if they aren't already.
